name: Ctenanthe Setosa
description: A beautiful foliage plant with heart-shaped leaves and striking, bold patterns.
watering: Keep the soil consistently moist; avoid waterlogging to prevent root rot.

name: Hoya Multifolia
description: A compact Hoya variety with thick, rounded leaves and clusters of star-shaped flowers.
watering: Allow the top half of the soil to dry out between waterings; water less in winter.

name: Pilea Cadierei
description: Known as the Aluminum Plant, it features striking, silvery markings on its heart-shaped leaves.
watering: Keep the soil evenly moist; allow the top inch to dry out between waterings.

name: Ruscus Aculeatus
description: Also known as Butcher's Broom, it has dense, evergreen foliage that adds a lush look to any space.
sunlight: Bright, indirect light to partial shade
watering: Keep the soil consistently moist; reduce watering during the dormant season.

name: Kalanchoe Fedtschenkoi
description: A compact succulent with fuzzy, silver-gray leaves and delicate, tubular flowers.
watering: Allow the soil to dry out between waterings; water sparingly in winter.

name: Ceropegia Linearis
description: Known as the String of Dolphins, it features unique, dolphin-shaped leaves that trail elegantly.
watering: Allow the soil to dry slightly between waterings; water less during inactive periods.

name: Neoregelia
description: A vibrant bromeliad with colorful, flame-like inflorescences and rosettes of lush foliage.
watering: Fill the central cup with water and keep the soil lightly moist; change water regularly.

name: Senecio Mandraliscae
description: Known as Blue Chalksticks, it features slender, blue-gray stems with small, tubular flowers.
watering: Allow the soil to dry out between waterings; water sparingly in winter.

name: Beaucarnea Gracilis
description: A graceful succulent with long, thin trunks and arching, strap-like leaves.
sunlight: Bright, indirect light to full sun
watering: Allow the soil to dry out completely between waterings; water sparingly in winter.

name: Schindleria Stolzii
description: A rare and delicate plant with fine, feathery foliage that adds a soft texture to any arrangement.
sunlight: Bright, indirect light to partial shade
watering: Keep the soil lightly moist; allow the top inch to dry out between waterings.
